title: JSON Schema for my JSON file format

Source.description: The title of the source the race was added in

Page.description: The page the race can be found on in the source

Link.description: The link to dndtools.net for the race as a reference

SubraceOf.description:
The direct race this race was derived from.
For Example: a Lesser Dark Elf is a Subrace of Dark Elf, which is a subrace of Elf.

Type.description:
The races type.
0 - Aberration
1 - Animal
2 - Celestial
3 - Construct
4 - Dragon
5 - Elemental
6 - Fey
7 - Fiend
8 - Giant
9 - Humanoid
10 - Magical_Beast
11 - Monstrous_Humanoid
12 - Ooze
13 - Outsider
14 - Plant
15 - Undead
16 - Vermin

1 - Angel
2 - Aquatic
3 - Archon
4 - Augmented
5 - Chaotic
6 - Cold

15 - Good

FavoredClass.description:
The races favored class(es), if any
If the race has 'Any' as it's favored class, this field has to be NULL!

SizeHitDice.description:
The type of racial hitdie.
For example a 'd8' is simply noted as '8'

SizeCategory.description:
The races default sizeCategory.
MULTI-SIZED RACES HAVE TO BE NOTED IN THE COMMENT ABOVE SIZECATEGORY IN RACE.CS!
-4 - Fine
-3 - Diminutive
-2 - Tiny
-1 - Small
0 - Medium
1 - Large
2 - Huge
3 - Gargantuan
4 - Colossal
5 - BiggerThanColossal

Movement.description:
The races movement modes.
Use the name of the movement as Key and the range as value.
For Example: Flyspeed 30ft. = "Fly": "30"
Keys derived from 'Enums.cs/MovementModes'

Senses.description:
The races senses like low-light vision, blindsight, etc.
If the sense is limited to a static range (opposed by senses like low light vision, hich just double the standard vision range) enter the range in feet as an int, otherwise enter 'NULL'.
An exception is 'Improved Low-Light Vision', to insert this you set 'Low-light Vision' as key and set its value to '2' (aka '2' * LLV Range)'
Key derived from Enums.cs/Sense.
